title: I'm useless.
body: I can't understand what the hell this game is doing to me but it is making me depressed for the past three months. I can't go a single, And I do mean even one game without being called useless or trash...At first I just ignored it with a smile on my face now I am for some reason all worked up and can't seem to focus anymore. All I can think of during every game now is how I am useless, I will never improve, And not a single person around me has the ability to be encouraging and only seems to want to put me down as much as possible...God I suck at all of this. Even my logic and clear venting is horrible.

Remember everyone you play with is in the same elo as you. 

General advice: I see you like to run teleport and ignite and you play tank champions. Tank champions usually are pretty immobile and don't need kills to be useful later on, so id suggest you ditch ignite for flash. 
Second, if you really want to improve, you need to work on your cs. Either go to the practice tool to work on it, or the next few games you play REALLY focus on that. Don't worry about kills, don't worry risky trades, don't worry about lane pressure as much, just get that last hit on minions. 
Finally, maybe watch some streamers. Solorenektononly is a great one for learning more about the game (don't worry, he plays more than just reneketon)

Since the update to pings a while back, there is nothing useful anyone can ever say.  Item on cooldown?  Use a ping.  Low mana? Use a ping.  You want baron and smite is up?  Use 2 pings.  You are going back?  Ping you have enough gold for that item you want and tell them to fall back with a caution ping.  The enemy's summoner spells were just used?  Ping them.  Enemies are almost respawning when you are pushing base?  Ping their death timers.
So true. So very true. Before the update, I hesitated to mute. After, no prob muting them because anything useful they can use pings.

Looking through your games, I think your CS is the biggest problem. You are regularly only getting 3 CS per min. You want that to be around 7-8. No cs > less gold > less items > champion is weaker. I promise you, if you are getting 6-7 CS a min you will be a factor in your games. 

You are doing good with Khazix, Illaoi, Naut, Garen, Xin and Talon. I would stick to those picks since you are above 50% winrate on those guys. Practice GP and Sol more if you want to play them as your winrates are really low.

It's not the game itself that is toxic, it is the players within the game. The vast majority of gamers (in general) are emotionally immature, ego-centric 'kids' that do not have much in the way of empathy and respect for others -- primarily due to the anonymous nature of video games on the internet. Either through bad role models, (lack of) upbringing and/or education on how to be a generally "good person", gamers are also generally hopped up on adrenaline rushes and have competitiveness to "be the best". Even those who play more on the side of "for funsies" and are not _as competitive_ as others, they can still be more critical and harsh about the mistakes of other players with them (since the win/lose condition of League relies on you relying on strangers' help). More often than not this frustration, anger and resentment about being dependent on others to win a game where you, at the very least, are playing to win, and you have a recipe for asshole-ish behavior and downright nasty, disgusting attitudes.
so basically, this game is competitive as shit, even outside of ranked, which breeds toxicity to a sense

Competition has no correlation with _toxicity_, there is a huge different between being toxic and having friendly banter. In league as within all sports or anything competitive by nature, toxicity is correlated directly with the kind of people that are involved and their overall level of emotional maturity. Essentially, if you're an asshole or tend to become an asshole toward others when playing a video game; it's not the game or that you're competing that makes you one, you just are an asshole.

just /mute all at the start of each game. Trust me it helps, even those of us with the thickest of skins can get affected by enough toxicity and flaming, _especially_ if you're stuck in a spiral of losing games or playing poorly (because then you're not only hard on yourself, but start to believe what others say about your performance, too).

Don't sweat it, don't let others' egos and shitty attitudes determine your self worth. Not in this game, not in life or anywhere else. You are you, and only you control your words, actions and abilities. You don't need the respect or approval of anyone.

Remember, the majority of these kids that are talking shit about/to you, have problems and issues of their own (both in-game and in their lives), and are flawed human beings just like the rest of us. No one is perfect, all are flawed, but that's the beauty of it. You can always strive to do better, be better, and there's no one out there that has the power or authority to criticize you on that, because they are no better off than you or me. It's all in your perception of things, and what value you assign to the words and actions others send your way.
